name: Life of an Aspiring Indie Dev
name_original: Life of an Aspiring Indie Dev
description: This game is a simulation of the life of an aspiring indie game dev. You have a job that you don't want to do even though you don't dislike it. Once in your lifetime you want to get your hands on game development. So you do you job, save some money and learn some relevant skill while keeping your sanity in check. Once you will have enough savings, you can go on your venture of indie game dev.
